website_summaries.verdict: Simple to fill, set, and remind you to take your pills until they are physically removed from the device.
pros: Ideal for everyday medication, whether for an illness or general health
Stubborn, yet configured to only provide one's daily dosage and ensure it's taken
Simplifies lives and especially those with stringent medication schedules
cons: There are small pieces to this device, which may not be ideal for those without full use of their hands

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!! ITEM CAN NOT BE RETURNED. YOU ARE STUCK WITH IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!! Two problems. Number one: Nowhere does it state the item has to be literally turned upside down to retrieve the pills and stop the alarms from continuing to going off. My 95 year old mother, with her totally arthritic hands, can not do this. Second and largest problem: No where on the order page does it state the item CAN NOT BE RETURNED. I feel the order page should have made this abundantly clear. Once you buy the item and attempt to return it, then you find out that "no returns are allowed". Now we are stuck with an $85.00 item, which will be used as an expensive paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: livinleon

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if this unit was defective, but would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser did not work past the first few days after I set it up. It started skipping around doses and my already confused father had a heck of a time tracking his pills, many times under- or over-dosing. I don't know if the unit was defective, but I assume so. I kept resetting it for my father, kept resetting the alarms and dosage schedule hoping it would resolve the matter, but it never did. By the time I was ready to throw in the towel and return it, it was 1 day past the return window. My father is now out $80 for this mis-functioning unit.
customer_reviews.author: C. Alisa

customer_reviews.title: White Lid
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 93 year old mother and everything is great, unit is easy to program. But I did not pay enough attention and when it came in I found it had a solid white lid. Once you close the lid then you can not see what pills have been taken or what is left, or what the time is on the unit without unlocking and opening the lid back up. I keep the unit locked so she does not have to worry about accidently opening it and all the pills falling out when she turns it over. I have since ordered a identical unit with a clear lid that better suits our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: I won't miss again!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and would buy again and recomend it to family or friends. One nrgative comment I have about this product, PLEASE make The "LCD Display" at least three times larger. I'm 76 years old, and I had to use a magnafier to set up the Pill Ddispenser, not an easy yask. Probably took me 2hours longrer than it should. I would think on the companies part to think about the costumers who are going to use the. My 45 year old son would not have a problem, B isure did. Other than that I love the dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Riconn

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. No.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. The battery compartment was faulty and although the batteries were in flush, the machine would turn off at random. This means my mother who has Dementia would miss her alarms/meds. I taped the battery compartment and tried other things to no avail. Then the lock just stopped working and Amazon, nor the Vendor with refund or replace. Do NOT buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Great for Seniors with memory challenges or lots of pills to keep track of
customer_reviews.text: My mom was getting confused with her medication. We were worried she could overdose or forget to take key medications. This is proving to be lifesaving and while she still needs us to monitor and handle all her medications it's giving her more control and independence back without the worry for her or us. Is it perfect? No. I'd like those paper inserts to be more durable. But it's definitely worth it. Durability on the actual device, I can't speak to because we only just bought it last week. But, I think it's a great product and feels pretty sturdy. Hardest part was figuring out how to open it at the first. The locking portion is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Life changing pill dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: A family member of mine has to take different meds twice a day and it was a pain counting out the correct pills every time. With the LiveFine Automatic Pill Dispenser I load it up and the alarm sounds at the required time and it dispenses the correct pills. No more watching the clock for the next dose of pills and if the person is alone they will always take the correct meds. It has a lock which really only keeps the lid closed, if you need something that is kid or addiction proof this is not the one. I will keep using this as long as we need to take meds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 month....
customer_reviews.text: Then it started just giving us error messages and beeping uncontrollably. We changed the batteries, and that seemed to work for about 8 hours. Then it started beeping again. We tried a second time, and it failed. I contacted the company and they suggested we exchange it. But I don't have a lot of faith in this product any more. I also don't feel like investing in the $300 models. So, we're kind of stuck. Now she's saying that she can be put on the 'honor' system and we're back where we started.
customer_reviews.author: Mpwmpw

customer_reviews.title: Nice Aid for Caregiving but Watch out the Lock!
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser works great especially with older folks having trouble remembering to take their medications. You can pre-fill as needed and set the times. The trick is providing a reminder for the person you are caring for to look at it or listen for the alarm. After about 2 months of use, the key lock on the unit broke apart and fell out! My advice is keep an eye on the lock. A small screw is what holds the lock together and it can back out. This caused it to jam a couple of times and the pill box can no longer be locked.
customer_reviews.author: KellyV_Ark

customer_reviews.title: disappointing medication dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality medication dispenser. Battery compartment did not stay securely closed from the onset. After 2 weeks the carousel stopped advancing and an error message flashed. The directions were confusing and there were no printed trouble shooting directions. For the price I expected a much better quality item. Plus the fact that the carousel did not advance posed a safety risk since I work and needed to depend on this devise to make my husband's medications available when I am not at home. Contacted amazon and a refund was issued.
customer_reviews.author: Elvira

customer_reviews.title: I am a health care provider and recommend this to all patients when memory becomes an issue
customer_reviews.text: I had left a 4 star review two weeks ago only to find that this device is malfunctioning and my aunt missed a week's worth of her medication. When I tried to return the device or at least receive a replacement I was informed that they do not provide refunds or replacements which suggests they have had problems with this device in the past and are promoting an inferior product. I will not order from this company again but do recommend to purchase an automated dispenser from a reputable company that will give a refund for a malfunctioning device.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we've purchased for mom - she has issues from time to time getting her pills right, and this gives us peace of mind, knowing that she's taking the right pills at the right time. One complaint/concern - where you dump the pills out, there's a little lip, which wouldn't seem like much, but sometimes the smallest pills will catch on it, and if she doesn't notice, she will miss taking those and take them with the second dose of pills for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Char B.

customer_reviews.title: Having problems after a couple months use
customer_reviews.text: This was really a great product but now, it gives an err message after about 2 days. It will just beep continually until you take out the batteries. The instructions don't give any trouble shooting for this type of situation. Still trying to find out online if there is a way to fix it. This was very expensive for it to quit working properly already. Can't find any way to reach the seller so I'm hoping this review will help others with their choice.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: An excellent pill dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well. All those in my family and parent caregiver circle who told me not to buy it are glad that I did. We all love it. Occasionally, some of dad's "sticky" vitamin pills will stick in the slot, but that's it. The alarm is loud and the light flashes so that he almost never misses a pill time, and yet he is no longer overmedicating like he was before the LiveFine automatic dispenser. We only do morning and night, so I can fill every other Saturday for two weeks at a time. Excellent! So glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica OK

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I have a family member who is having memory problems and was taking either to many meds in one day or forgetting altogether to take them. We were using a 7 day pill box. This pill dispenser is wonderful, it has given us peace of mind, once you lock it there is no risk of under/over dosing. It has only one problem and that is that sometimes it reports an "ERR" (error) and the alarm keeps going even if you turn it upside down (this stops the alarm). Sometimes it's very annoying and we still haven't found how to fix this, however, we continue using it. Great product, and recommend it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Aly K

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for my grandma. She was always taking her pills really late or never taking them at all due to forgetting or being lazy... well this pill reminder did the trick! It wont shut up until you turn it upside down (thats ho you get the pills out). Its beeps really loud. It has different beeping sounds so if you or your loved one is hard of hearing it has different frequencies in the beeping. Very helpful. My grandma hates it just because she had to actually get up and take her pills...ON TIME! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shelbey

customer_reviews.title: Bad e-pill knock-off
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Unfortunately I did. 1) Batteries do not remain in proper contact thus randomly loses power 2) Paper templates are absurd; they need to be glued or taped to remain in place. It does not offer sufficient customization for pill frequencies. 3) an AC adapter option would have been nice
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use for the elderly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my elderly mother to decrease errors with medications when she got home from the hospital. My brother is an engineer and I’m an NP. We had great difficulty with getting it set up and to use. Unfortunately the 30 day window ended before we realized this was not going to work. We kept trying. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. C. Drapek

customer_reviews.title: Great product for medication management.
customer_reviews.text: My mother is 89 and in the early stages of dementia. She still lives alone. She takes several medications twice a day and had starting getting confused on when to take them. She forgets what day it is and sometimes double doses. We tried several different pill containers to no avail. We purchased this product a couple of months ago and it has worked perfectly. She can no longer double dose and there has only been once that she missed a day. It is easy to program and the slots that hold the pills will hold several large and small ones. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great if you can navigate the menu
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom to help her take all her medications on time. There are 3 buttons to use in setting up this unit and it's not so intuitive to use. You must read and follow the manual carefully to program it. I hope I don't loose the manual! Anyway, once it's setup, it works great and my mom has no problem getting her pills out of it on time (2 large capsules and 5 small tablets). Battery lasts a long time! it's still on the provided battery after over 9 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: A life saver
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product for my father. He takes morning/evening medications. Very helpful reminding him to take his meds, lights up and has an alarm. The lock feature is super, he can not get into the pill organizer and mess up his medications. It is a bit hard to set up initially, but they do have an instruction video available online. I do wish the pill slots were a bit larger.
customer_reviews.author: Sheril Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Did not perform as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective and did not alarm or advance properly. The clock function would quit working, even when new batteries were installed. On the few occasions it did work, the pill tray advanced 2 spaces rather than one. This meant appropriate meds were skipped and meds that were supposed to be taken later at night were taken inappropriately. Luckily I was monitoring the device closely and I caught the error quickly. If I had not been keeping a close watch, my mother's medicine would have been incorrect for 9 days before it would have been discovered. I am returning the device for a refund and researching alternate products to order. My confidence in the product is low.
customer_reviews.author: Leah H. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!! NO TEMPLATE OR KEY INCLUDED AND CANT RETURN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Opened box and item did not include any templates and did not include a key...totally unusable!!!! Also, when I went to send it back for a new one, it tells me it is unreturnable!!! $100 for an unusable piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO, Dont purchase
customer_reviews.text: Worst quality product I have ever purchased. Broke on the 1st day. Company would not take back. I would never recommend this product or the customer service of this product to anyone. I wish I would do "negative" stars. I spent a lot of money to have a "high quality" product and this is a huge regret. Please do not make the same mistake I did and purchase this! I am a medical professional and I would say especially do not get this for a family member with memory problems on when to take there medication. This product was basically a hazard and a huge waste of a lot of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Supernurse386

customer_reviews.title: Working good
customer_reviews.text: Its been two weeks now and so far so good. Got it for my dad with dementia. More time would be needed to see. Mechanically it works as should. It is still up to him to take the meds out. But it keeps him from taking too many. Only advice is the alarm could be louder. He'll sleep right through it but at least he know its there waiting when he does wake up.
customer_reviews.author: James Hill

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Alzheimer’s patient
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom who has Alzheimer’s. She moved from my house to an assisted living, but med management is $500/month. I bought this I’m hopes of rescuing her monthly rate. So far, it has worked great! She has been using it for a year. I refill it once a month and check batteries. So far, it’s still part of her routine. It has saved us thousand of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work and is not returnable!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if possible. I unfortunately bought 2 thinking that they’d be helpful for my 91 year old dad. I opened one. Set it up and did the test mode and filled it. It only worked to dispense 2 doses before failing to advance and not working to properly dispense anything else. Had to manually remove pills and hoped to return because it doesn’t work. I never even opened the 2nd dispenser and Amazon won’t let me return either. Do NOT buy this product! It is a waste of money and much too expensive for a product that doesn’t work or a company that doesn’t stand behind its products. Extremely Disappointed and upset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for people struggling with memory issues.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my 94 yr old mother who has dementia. She also is hearing impaired. I liked the fact that it had an alarm which honestly is very loud but she still cannot hear it. She does notice the flashing light. I also like the lock mechanism so she can’t move pills around. Make sure you get the one with the clear top so you can see if the pills have been taken. It was a little tricky programming it. But once it is programmed, you don’t have to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: 8 months later.....
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product but just the other day, when the alarm went off, the pill dispenser did not turn. Also, when you manually move it and turn it over to take the pills out, the alarm will not go off. I made sure to clean it and reset but it doesn't turn any more and the alarm still never stops. I have to take the battery out. Didn't last long. Very sad about that. I would not purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well so far
customer_reviews.text: So far, this seems to be working well for my mother who has memory loss issues. It was pretty easy to set up, and I like that it can dispense pills more than just once a day. I would have preferred the clear lid, but 1 day shipping wasn’t offered for that version. I also wish it wasn’t so easy to open even when locked. My dad accidentally forced it open and it messed up the dispensing. If my parents can just remember to leave it alone except when pouring the pills out, then I think this will work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Elara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly how it said it would. My only complaint is that it only came with 1 key. My sister in law and I take turns refilling it. We always have to hide the key. It would have been nice if each of us had one to put on our keychain. My mother in law has dementia and insists she can refill it, and is constantly looking for the key! Other than that, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hope R.

customer_reviews.title: Pills never missed again
customer_reviews.text: The pill box is amazing , it has made life so much simpler... no worries about them getting spilled or someone mixing them up and dad says it has a perfect tone to remind him it’s time to tak his medicine! We bought two since he has so many pills we have one 30 day box for morning and one for evening since he takes his meds twice a day this way I only have to fill Them once a month and lock them shut !
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I had got one before and it work great for about a year
customer_reviews.text: I had got one before and it work great for about a year, and my sister broke it. So I got another, the print in the how to set up unit was so light I could hardly read it. I could never it to work right. Sent it back got another one hoping that it would work, but to no it did not. So I returned that All so. Then I checked out Med-e-lert by GMS same looking item so I got that one and it's great.. :)
customer_reviews.author: Joann D.

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS GOD SENT!  WHAT A BLESSING!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I don't have to worry about mom remembering to take her pills! A very loud alarm rings consistently until the dispenser is flipped over to access the medication. My mom, who lives alone and has Alzheimer's, has had this machine for about 18 months now and it has proved to be quite reliable. If the patient takes medication twice a day like my mom, they will be able to store two weeks worth of medication in the device. If once a day, it will hold up to four weeks of medication.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Silverio

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your meds on schedule !
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one I have purchase in 2 years . The first one stopped working and it was beyond the return date. The second one is working fine so we decided to get another for my other parent to keep the medications on schedule. So far so good ! It would be nice if they could make the alarm volume louder since some folks have difficulty hearing the alarm . Good thing there is a small light on the top .
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to set up at first. But we called the manufacturer, and they helped us with no problem. It seems like just the answer for my mom. We had seen other pill dispensers that you had to push a button to make it change to the next time, and buttons are hard for her. And why have someone with memory problems have to remember to push a button?? This one works just great. The alarm goes off, and as soon as she lifts it and takes the pills out, the alarm stops. It does not move to the next set ofnpills and open until the ext alarm goes off. Nothing for her to remember. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for elderly with some memory difficulty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandpa who gets confused and was taking the wrong medication at the wrong time and sometimes doubling which can be dangerous. This does exactly what we need it to do. Now if there’s significant memory difficulty I would be concerned that someone may not remember what the beeping means and just ignore it and not take the medications but my grandpa doesn’t have that difficulty at least not yet.
customer_reviews.author: BRose

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you don't have someone who obsesses over it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great if you don't have someone who obsesses over it and keeps dropping it. The one I bought for my grandmother broke, but before that it worked great. Also got one for my mother in law. Great for people who just can't remember to take their pills. I'm sure I'll be needing one of these some day and if we don't own a robot that dispenses pills by then, I'll get one of these. Great purchase, a little pricey, but worth the money for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Zolu

customer_reviews.title: Best pill dispenser for someone with dementia
customer_reviews.text: Best Investment ever made. My husband has early stages of dementia and was constantly mis taking his meds. Bought this almost 2 years ago and its a godsend for him and me both. He takes 16 pills a day between am and pm, some are large pills and they all fit. I can fill this up for 2 weeks, lock it and set the timers and no mistakes. Easy to program and use. Only replaced the batteries once. He is delighted as its easy for both of us and he always knows now if hes taken his pills. Only complaint is the tiny screw on the lock has to be tightened a lot.... but otherwise...w hff at a blessing!
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my mother's medication but...This is the second dispenser. The first one I purchased 8 months ago and the locking mechanism fell off. The item works well but use caution when locking and unlocking to turn only 1/4 turn. Any further will cause lock to loosen and eventually fall off. Its a bit of a pain to set up but once it is your good to go. I like it that you can order an extra tray and key-
customer_reviews.author: stephanie bergeron

customer_reviews.title: YOU CANNOT RETURN THIS!
customer_reviews.text: If this product was less than 10 dollars I probably wouldn't write this review, but this is a $100 item that CANNOT be returned. Brand new, never broke the seal or removed item from the box, but cannot return it. Whomever is responsible for the no return policy should know that I am praying they are force fed sugar-free gummy bears that cause explosive non-stop diarrhea. If you've read this far, please don't buy this product if for any reason you might need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: helpful for dementia patient
customer_reviews.text: This has a been a huge help for my mom with dementia. I highly recommend getting the clear top device instead of the white top. I originally purchased the one with the white/solid cover. My mom found it frustrating and upped her anxiety when she couldn't see her pills inside. The clear version solved that problem. The locking device is awkward to use and I can imagine won't last forever, bit for now it gives us peace of mind that Mom gets her medicine as directed twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: jth

customer_reviews.title: This is the best pill dispenser system we have tried
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pill dispenser system we have tried. In the past year, we have bought several timers and pill cases, but they didn't measure up to what we wanted. Recently, a friend recommended this LiveFine dispenser; we bought it and are delighted. It's so much quicker to fill this one than the other types with the flaps that raise up. The instructions were understandable re: setting the timer and the unit has performed really well. The only problem I have is getting the top plastic lid to disengage after I unlock it with the key. It sometimes sticks, but eventually comes open.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. The daily dispensing slots do not line up well with the opening to release meds. Turning he dispenser over to release the meds causes the meds inside to shift into other slots and therefore cause your loved ones to take the wrong meds. Finally, directions and set up for this device is confusing. I am returning this product so as not to over or undermedicate my father.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Kane

customer_reviews.title: This is a replacement for the identical product I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for the identical product I purchased a year ago. I found that unit difficult to program because of the poorly written "instructions" and the tiny display, however I finally managed to master the task. The previous dispenser's lid broke when the unit was dropped and would no longer lock so I had to replace it. In spite of this product's flimsy lid and locking mechanism, I purchased it again because the price was right. At least I didn't have to learn a whole new programming procedure.
customer_reviews.author: storyteacher

customer_reviews.title: Angry!
customer_reviews.text: This thing doesn’t work correctly and can’t be returned!!! That’s ridiculous!! DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what i would do without this think for my mom. More than worth the money. It has been going constantly now for over two yrs. All i have had to do to it is replace the batteries and put pills in every 2 weeks. It has run perfectly since my purchase. Highly recommend for anyone that has trouble keeping up with multiple pills that have to be taken.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible company De Broth - bought this for my mother ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible company De Broth - bought this for my mother who has developed dementia/Alzheimers and it malfunctioned. Tried to return it and DeBroth would Not honor the return for their product within the 30 day window which in my opinion should be longer but still they would not return even though it was less than 30 days!! Amazon refunded the money - I was very happy about this and will continue to use Amazon and recommend them. But do not buy anything from DeBroth - they are marketing to a vulnerable population of people and then not even standing by their product. It's disgraceful! Terrible company!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Lock broke within 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: The lock broke within 2 weeks of use. Locking mechanism was very flimsy, and simply fell apart upon unlocking one evening. We have continued to use it because the rest of it functions, but now Mom has figured out how to open it since the lock doesn’t work and we are starting to have confusion again about medicine doses. I would not recommend this to someone looking for a secure way to manage medicine doses.
customer_reviews.author: Millie Serna

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing greed
customer_reviews.text: The product and fulfillment were as described and is a good product. I feel the manufacturer takes advantage of the purchaser however; the item only comes with one security key and when I called for another I was told I had to purchase a second for $9.95 )more than 10% of the cost of the dispenser) which is a crime considering there is a reason people use this security dispenser and most products with keys always include two.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Kruss

customer_reviews.title: Like others listed
customer_reviews.text: Like others listed, after a couple of days the dispenser simply stopped rotating and dispensing pills. The clock appeared to be off as well. I would take out and re-insert the batteries, add new batteries, and eve programmed a full rotation of the gears to make sure there wasn't a problem there. No matter what it always lasted two days.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Confidence trumps minor flaws
customer_reviews.text: I had a difficult time getting the wings of the circular papers that tell whether your pills are Sun a.m., Sun p.m., Monday a.m., etc to fold down into place well. They could be made with some type of sticky material so they would stay folded down because they do sometimes get in the way of the pills coming out. Also, larger pills sometimes get stuck in the slot, but overall I feel so much more confident that my mother is getting her pills when she needs them and not getting them mixed up like before with the other type of pillminders.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t forget to change the time when daylight saving time comes up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly father who kept forgetting to take his medication. This has worked out great and it took a while but he has figured out how to use it and fill it. The only bad thing about this product is the locking mechanism is terrible and broke. However, this does not affect the operation of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: AJVenckus

customer_reviews.title: Still No R e f u n d
customer_reviews.text: The back doesn’t stay closed. Batteries loose so it won’t turn consistently. Dad misses meds 3-4 times per week. PLUS it’s hard to fill when u have a lot of pills. (edit 4/20) Live fine sent a brand new box. It Does turn properly. But Dad can’t hear alarm and pills don’t fall out easily. I think whoever could use this box doesn’t really need it. I added one star for customer service. But.. it’s no good for us.
customer_reviews.author: billybatson

customer_reviews.title: The light blinks.  My pills are freed from their bondage.
customer_reviews.text: I take a lot of vitamins. Evidently I like pills. I put my pills in little cavities in a plastic tray that goes around and around once per two weeks. Every half day some of the pills are shown their freedom. Mostly I grab them and swallow them before they can even scream, but sometimes they stay in their cell and sleep through the process.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: The product works well. We use it for an ...
customer_reviews.text: The product works well. We use it for an 85 year old family member. This is the second one we have purchased. The only issue we have had with the product is that the small screw that holds the lock together has come lose. The last occasion this happened some of the lock components were lost and we had to replace the entire product. If you purchase the product I would suggest you watch for this issue.
customer_reviews.author: James P Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Too much room for error
customer_reviews.text: The timer worked as expected and it was easy to fill. However, the product was not error proof. The medication carrousel sometimes moved too far and the person took the medication out prior to the time for administrating the pill. This allowed the person almost taking a 3rd dose of pills in the day. Also, this product is NOT for a person that may tamper with the medication. The carousel was able to be pushed ahead to get the medication out. Too much room for error for us to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen  Lynne McTiernan

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This pill dispenser is poorly made. After 8 weeks it cannot be depended upon. It periodically displays Err and will not dispense and the alarm will not turn off. There seens to be a problem with the box that holds the batteries. The batteries are easily disconnected and then of course there is no alarm. Also the cover is also broken.
customer_reviews.author: janet smith

customer_reviews.title: Pills get take on time. With minimal hassle.
customer_reviews.text: I like the alarming and the fact it dispenses only what it should. Then it shuts off once it is inverted to get the pills out. Some pill can get missed because of the coating of the pill but it is well worthwhile. Keeps my mom on track with her medication. She has broken one and we have had to replace it. Setting the clock for different time zone can be a little tricky. Takes some getting use to for programming.
customer_reviews.author: Big V

customer_reviews.title: one star
customer_reviews.text: This product had the updated locking device and still failed. product worked from dec 6th till January 15th, then the locking device pushed through and now I cannot open the lid. I only unlocked it three times. I am returning the product. too bad because it worked well until the lock broke and I was very careful opening and closing the device.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ariano

customer_reviews.title: Necessary
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one we have ordered in the past 2 years. Hopefully this one will last longer. The lock wears out and falls apart, and the pieces are so tiny you can't find them to put back together with tiny screw. This one arrived in good condition, was easy to set up. I like the opaque lid and ability to program it many ways. Having a locked device cuts down on my mom taking too many pills at the wrong time.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, works well
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly for holding and dispensing my mom's pills twice a day. It is a little flimsy, and I wish it also had a lock on the battery compartment because my mom tries to fiddle with it (duct tape seems to be discouraging her). But otherwise it's been working well for months, and was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Adverb

customer_reviews.title: You can not return this item - CHEAP PRODUCT - DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware that you can NOT return this item. I think that is wrong. It is very hard to even set the time or to set this up. The alarm is not very loud. I bought these because they were cheaper than one I like that I spend a lot more money on. VERY DISAPPOINTING!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Expecting good things...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to configure and appears to work well. Haven't put into service with my mother-in-law yet, but I expect it to do well. Silenced all alarms and set one AM alarm (light - only) for morning dispensing. 2nd carousel will be handy to simplify reloading: load the empty carousel and replace the one in use 28 days later (or as determined by your dispensing schedule). Unless you have a lot of pills or many (many) large pills, the dispensing cell should be of adequate size. Would be nice if there was a lid or cap on the dispensing cell to protect the active group of pills and prevent spillage.
customer_reviews.author: HappyHeathen

customer_reviews.title: A life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical but this pill case is amazing and has kept my father in law from over dosing on his medications, So yes I would recommend this for anyone but especially for the elderly and it has a key to open it. Make sure to order the cover that is white, seeing the pills confuses him and thinks he has not taken them, so we sprayed painted ours white and does great with it Now.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Simmons

customer_reviews.title: It works great, the reminder is great
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for and needed for our elderly mother. It works great, the reminder is great, it allows my mom to take her meds, the correct ones, each day at the same time. This dispenser has allowed us to finally regulate her meds for the first time. I would absolutely recommend this product to any family that has a hard time keeping meds regulated.
customer_reviews.author: LLP

customer_reviews.title: Best Automatic Pill Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: As I had no idea what I was searching for or even needed, Amazon really helped me make my decision. This locked pill dispenser is perfect for my 82 year old mom. She loves the light/buzzer that goes off when it’s time for her medicine and yet, she still has her independence in taking her own medicines. I wish I would have gotten this sooner and please do not be fooled by other websites out there as this one saved me over $90.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good use For convenience!
customer_reviews.text: She had one before from her insurance. And it broke. She has Alzheimer’s so this thing helps, it won’t stop beeping until she got all her pills. And the cover is clear so it’s a plus we can see if it’s still full of medications she needs.
customer_reviews.author: JoJosMay

customer_reviews.title: Not so secure
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Portable -Lightweight -Lots of dosage options for almost any medication schedule you can think of Cons: -easily to break into, - if dropped will break -with the open slot, it can be manipulated to move to the next dose early. - alarm set up is confusing and the instructions are small -not good for those with dexterity issues. - Does not support adherence as it was advertised to. -The lock loosens easlily causing the device to unlock itself.
customer_reviews.author: Tamim Ansari

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd dispenser. The first lasted about 1 1/2 years. I needed to regulate my mother from taking to many pills. This works by only opening once a day. I only use the blinking light vs the alarm. It's easy to see that mom has taken her pills and gives peace of mind that she is not taking too many or more than once a day.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Not a secured holder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father who is very forgetful and he figured out how to move the carousel, so he would take 2 doses when he thought he had forgotten. So if forgetful is not the issue it will work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: A GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 91 yo Mother where I didn't feel comfortable leaving more than a couple days of a certain medication. She takes a phenomenal low number of scripts so I am able to use a single alarm/day. I fill it for a 28 day period and now am able to plan and enjoy my visits with her. This has changed both my life and our relationship!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Roth

customer_reviews.title: Use quality batteries from the start.
customer_reviews.text: So far this unit is performing as it should. Reading some of the reviews about the unit failing within a few days, I would suspect the batteries that come with it. Really poor quality batteries. I replaced them with Energizers and all sees to be working great. This has really solved a problem for my mother-in-law and gave my wife some peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: NeonD

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.  NO RETURNS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these bc both of my parents have Alzheimers. The one worked fine for about a week, then it completely stopped working. Not only did it stop moving, but when we tried to open it with the key the entire locking mechanism fell out. The 2nd one lasted a bit longer than the first, but it too has issues. Amazon should definitely remove this from it's amazon's choice because the product is awful and now I'm out $160. In addition, the no returns policy should be clearly stated on the front page, just like brick and mortar stores have to.
customer_reviews.author: Arlsz

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but lock is not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: The lock mechanisms require only a quarter turn to open, but are not very durable as my wife has broken two of the locks. The devices still close tightly and clasp, but are not locked shut - and are worth keeping for the alerting beeper and automated dosing which she loves. If you do not need to keep the medication secure and are primarily using it as a timed reminder for kids of elderly who will not intentionally over dose or discard other doses, then it can still be a very valuable device.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gage

customer_reviews.title: UNSAFE Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has mental issues so I bought this "locking" box to protect her so she got a screw driver and unscrewed the so-called lock. I am furious. She could have overdosed because of this UNSAFE devise.
customer_reviews.author: Fayetta

customer_reviews.title: It works like a charm and dispenses right on time 4x a ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for an elderly relative who was forgetting to take meds. It works like a charm and dispenses right on time 4x a day just as I set it. Easy-to-follow set-up directions and many options for how many times you want it to dispense each day. Three different alarm tones to find the one that each person can best hear. This was a great investment for my relative's health and my peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Coldtoes

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I have only have this a little over a month and it doesn't work the battery lid does not stay shut and so the alarm does not go off. This is the 2nd one I have bought . Not happy about spending over $180 and still not having an item that works. I want to send it back and get a refund, but they go out right after the 30 days. Very frustrating. Would like some compensation from this company or a new one. Not sure why the clock doesn't stay on all the time -
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love the product this is my 3rd one, the lock broke on one of them and I have the white one but like the clear better because you can see the pills and know when to refill instead of having to open up and check. My grandfather has dementia so it keeps him from overdosing and helps him remember to eat, also what time of day it is. When the pills come out, it's time for a meal. As a nurse, when I am asked about how to keep family members safe I send pictures of the item to those who could benefit from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this type in the past. This particular brand is awful! The alarm won’t set to the specific time, the buttons don’t work according to the instructions. I wouldn’t give it any stars but I had to in order to write a review.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: A tremendous help! So glad we bought this.
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to get it all set up at first, but works great! Now, my mom doesn't have to rely on her memory. The alarm is loud enough to hear in another room, & is on time each time. Definitely happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poor manufacturing...NOT returnable!!!
customer_reviews.text: We were hoping the this pill box would be the answer to help my mother who has dementia and on a fixed income. I was very disappointed by this product. The lock can jiggle to an open position, the small pills get stuck behind the day template, and the battery door clasp broke...to top it off this item is not returnable, to the seller DBROTH, even though I tried within the 30 day time period on Amazon Prime. $85.89 came out of her grocery money for the month, and the box is broken, or not returnable!!!! Horrible
customer_reviews.author: steve ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Product works as intended, however, the pill compartments could be slightly larger. Vitamins are difficult too many in one slot. It would be nice if there were an option to change the octave of the tone that sounds to remind you to take your pills. My father can't here the tones at all and so depends on my mother to tell him if it's going off. Also, my parents complain about us locking their pill boxes on them because the cars don't travel well so if they want to go someplace they have to wait until they get home to take their meds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Product cannot be returned and alarm one an alarm two do not work on my device. Tried many times to reprogram it and it won’t reprogram very expensive mistake. It is actually dangerous because it cannot be reprogrammed dispensing is happening erroneously
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and priced right
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. We purchased this for my mother, who was diagnosed with dementia, to help keep her meds on schedule. This has worked 100% so far. Once you set it up, it is easy to maintain. We have used this for a few months now without any issues. We have the clear lid, but if the patient has anxiety concerning their meds, you may want to get the white lid.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Everything is very good about this pill dispenser except for the lock which ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is very good about this pill dispenser except for the lock which broke in less than a month. For home bound people who take a lot of pills throughout the day this device is excellent, too bad the lock is poorly designed which was a key feature.
customer_reviews.author: AGG

customer_reviews.title: Just got it but love it so far.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 91 year old father. Sometimes he was have trouble remembering to take his medicine or double taking it. Now he gets a reminder and he can not double take it anymore. So easy to setup. If you can set an alarm clock you can set is thing up.
customer_reviews.author: KAR

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: This device is literally a life saver. We can now feel confident that mom can only take her pills when she is supposed to. We have a caregiver that fills the box, locks it and removes the key so that mom can't open the box. The only issue she has with it is sometimes her stickier pills (like vitamin D), stick to it. She needs to ensure all the pills are taken out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed for Dad's handful of daily pills
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed. My elderly father takes about 21 pills a day at three different times of the day. This device was easy to set up when following the instructions. And it's been a huge help for Mom and Dad to manage. No more forgetting to take pills. And even better, they don't get locked out when they are delayed with a dosage. I couldn't be happier with this auto pill dispenser. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnie Put

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a pretty neat device.
customer_reviews.text: I like the escalating alarm. If you are there close by it does not pierce your eardrums but since it gets louder and louder it will NO T let you forget your meds! I like that and frankly I need that as sometimes I get busy and forget. I also like how easy it is to dump the dosage into your hand. A little pricey but worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has only worked 1 time?? It does not believe me of any of my duties . Of me being worried about my mom's meds . I would like my money back please.
customer_reviews.author: andrea parks

customer_reviews.title: It's not the most user friendly dispenser if you take alot of different medications
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn't have a cover over the hole and will DDT ump medication in you packet book if you take it with you. There is enough side to side play in the tray that very small pulls can slip out into you hands from your next dose slot causing you to get double dosed if your not paying attention. The paper tray labels have the week days written on them and if you use the six times a day label you dont have friday, saturday and sunday on the label causing confusion on those days.
customer_reviews.author: michael d.

customer_reviews.title: Great item for elderly folks who have trouble remembering to take their medicine
customer_reviews.text: This is the second LiveFine Automatic Pill Dispenser that I have purchased. My 96 year old mother has difficulty walking so I have placed one unit in the living room (for her morning and noon medicine) and one unit in her bedroom for her evening medicine. This eliminates the previous problem of her getting out of bed and going into the living room to get her evening medicine. The Alarma light and audible Alarma help remind her to take the medicine. It has been a tremendous help for us. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Edward S.

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful device
customer_reviews.text: We sent this to a family member who lives out of town and was forgetting to take his blood pressure medication. A friend of his helped him set it up and it beeps every morning at the specified time and dispenses the meds. It has really helped him over the past few weeks and we have gotten a report from the doctor that his blood pressure has stabilized for the first time in a few years. Very helpful device which has given us peace of mind when we are not there to give medication reminders.
customer_reviews.author: kwh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good, But Maybe I Have Fat Fingers
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Keeps me from forgetting. It doesn't shut up for an hour, so I finally notice and take my frickin' meds already. Thing is, when I'm filling the trays, if I need to take a pill out, I have to use a pen. Even the tip of my pinkie is a little too fat to dig the pill out. So it's a moderate pain to fill.
customer_reviews.author: DogsInSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Shorted out and melted
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked fine for 6 months and then today it shorted out and caught on fire! It melted the unit and the pills inside! I need a refund or a free replacement! My mother has the same unit and it is still functioning but I’m worried about it doing the same thing!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Awful product! And no eeturns!
customer_reviews.text: The alarm wont stop! The box is flimsy and pulls fall out! It doesnt shift correctly for dispensing :( VERY cheaply made.... and not returnable!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree willett

customer_reviews.title: This product was amazing and worked wonderfully for 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing and worked wonderfully for 4 months. But we have had to replace batteries about three times, and now it quit working. The worst problem is we didn't know that it had stopped working because we only visit my motherS once a week. It had stopped working since Thursday, and on Sunday we realized she had not taken her pills for a half week. This is really bad. This is the reason why we got this, to remind her to take them. Will have to wait until tomorrow before we can call anyone. Hopefully they will replace this defective one, and then we can come back and write it is great again.
customer_reviews.author: charles o sherwood

customer_reviews.title: A great product but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my grandmother who was having trouble remembering when to take her medication. It work great for a year and then one day we couldn't get it open and had to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: barrett g.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for a pill organizer!!
customer_reviews.text: This pill organizer is so easy to fill and it has a built-in alarm/timer, that you set, and when it is time to take your next dose the tray rotates and the timer beeps reminding you to take your meds. You can turn the alarm off and the unit still rotates to the next dosage time and a red light blinks instead of an alarm sounding. UPDATE ***Within 5 months, it stopped working! I replaced the batteries....NOTHING. Now it's just money wasted and more in the trash!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy🦚

product_meta.title: LiveFine Automatic Pill Dispenser, 28-Day Electronic Medication Organizer with Alarm Reminders, Flashing Light and Safety Lock - Dispenses Prescriptions Up to 6 Times Per Day - Clear Lid
product_meta.description:
Color:ClearNever miss or mix up a dose again!
LiveFine’s Automatic 28-Day Pill Dispenser keeps drug doses locked away until the exact moment they need to be taken. Featuring a timer and alerts, this protects against mistaken or forgotten dosages while eliminating the need for constant refilling. Alerts are easily programmed to the minute via the LCD interface. You can quickly customize the drug regimen with one of 6 rotating templates for 1-6 daily doses. Battery-operated (4 AAs included).

Convenient Compartments
28 spacious compartments each hold up to 18 aspirin-sized pills. Place an individual dose into each slot and select from one of 6 templates (1x, 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x or 6x daily). Each time the alerts sounds, the motorized carousel spins to reveal a compartment with 1 dose.

Intuitive Interface
The screen and controls enable users to set the clock, program alerts to the minute, and select from a variety of volume and other settings. The screen shuts after 10 minutes to save power, while smart technology keeps recorded settings even when batteries fail.

Custom Alerts
The unit buzzes loudly, and a blinking red light also illuminates for added alert. Mute the sound if desired, or select from 1 of 4 unique tones . Individual alerts will sound for 30 minutes until the patient retrieves pills. Secure Access

Secure Access
Secure Access.A latch feature provides extra safety people who might be a little forgetful. A manual key prevents inadvertent opening. For visibility, choose from clear, opaque white, or interchangeable covers.. Note that the cover can be pried open, so please use discretion.

The LiveFine Automatic Pill dispenser is not a medical device, and IS NOT INTENDED for use in the diagnosis of disease or other conditions, or in the cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease in man or other animals.
feature_bullets: Motorized 28-Slot Carousel Rotates & Delivers Scheduled Medicine; Great for Seniors & Caregivers
Audible & Visual Alerts Sound & Flash Up to 30 Minutes When Pills Are Due; Simply Flip & Remove Pills From Slot
Multiple Templates Allow Up to 6 Alerts Per Day; Program Exact Dispense Time for Custom Treatment
Audible & Visual Alerts Sound & Flash Up to 30 Minutes When Pills Are Due; Simply Flip & Remove Pills From Slot
High-Capacity Slots Accommodate Up to 18 Pills & Maximum 28 Days of Treatment for Minimal Refill

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
